website_summaries.verdict: A smaller folding table option for a couple of people to enjoy a nice meal or game outside. One of the few options that is completely weatherproof.
pros: Easy to fold up and store when not in use
Requires little time to fold and unfold when desired
cons: Too small for typical party or picnic use

customer_reviews.title: Would also work great for serving table
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a certain purpose--but ended up keeping it for home use! We pull this one out when we need some extra table space while working on a project. Would also work great for serving table. Very nice clean look, lightweight, and super easy to set up. Takes up very little space when storing (we keep it alongside the furnace in the basement). Full disclosure: We paid for this with our own money.
customer_reviews.author: John D.

customer_reviews.title: Essential for entertaining
customer_reviews.text: I've now owned this nifty little table for 4 years. I have used it on so many occasions as a serving side table I've lost count. Its easy to carry, is sturdy and very stable. Just whats needed during the holidays to use as an extra beverage table or dessert table. Don't honestly know how I got along without it!!
customer_reviews.author: Susan M.

customer_reviews.title: Size not true to website description
customer_reviews.text: Amazon said this table was 32 inches. This table is actually 31 inches ... description is wrong see attached photo
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Love this table - sturdy, light weight, flips closed in one motion. I keep one in my office at work so I can work with students. I keep it folded up behind my door when they aren’t around and pop it up when they come to see me and we need a table to do work. I keep the other one in my home office for similar purposes- when I need space to spread out, I pop it open, and when I’m done I put it away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Table Top flawed, uneven surface and round humps protruding on the table-top surface.
customer_reviews.text: I would never buy this table from this Company again. I was extremely disappointed in this table. The functionality of the fold-able legs worked but the table top was not flat, the surface was uneven and there were several bumps all over the top. I bought two of them and they were both of very POOR quality. I kept one as it was not as obscene as the other. The one I kept had only a few humps on the table-top surface. I had to return one of them as even with a table cloth covering the table you could see the flaws.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect description on size
customer_reviews.text: The description header states a 3 foot diameter tabletop. Further down, in the fine print, in specifications it does state 32" diameter. I didn't read everything on the page because I was in a hurry to order. I was expecting a 3 foot diameter table top. I got the 32" surprise when it arrived. 32" is significantly less tabletop than 36". Buyer should read EVERY PIECE OF INFORMATION ON THIS SELLERS PAGE so you know what you are actually buying. I will shop with less deceptive sellers from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our kitchen table in our RV. Took out old one - needed more space. This was perfect because we can fold it up and store it away. Very sturdy with our 2 labs walking around and not knocking it over.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 2

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and SUPER easy set-up!
customer_reviews.text: This came quick and ready to set up. All you have to do is take it out of the box and it is set! I love the size and the height. I am super pleased.
customer_reviews.author: A Nelsob

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality folding table. The design is simple, and it's easy to figure out. It's the perfect height and size for a dinner table for 2. It's lightweight. I'm a small woman, and I can easily pick up it up and move it even when it's open and has stuff on it, but it's not so lightweight that it seems flimsy. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: louisvillepropstylist

customer_reviews.title: Nice Table
customer_reviews.text: Very nice table except when it arrived it was slightly damaged on one side. I didn't return it because I need it for an event on Friday. I suggest better packing. At least pack with Styrofoam around it. If it wasnt damaged I would rate it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Erika Strickland

customer_reviews.title: Portable!
customer_reviews.text: Such an ideal table for a small apartments, when guests come over I can sit with them and enjoy some coffee while we chat, or even just sort my papers, focus on some of my hobbies. To then fold it up and have my open space once more. Love, love, love it!
customer_reviews.author: Eddy

customer_reviews.title: Pinching Hazard
customer_reviews.text: This table is a good size for what I was looking for, but the legs don't lock into place. so unfortunately I had my fingers pinched. I don't understand why they wouldn't lock the legs. Now I use zip ties to wrap around the legs so it doesn't collapse. For the money I paid ,I excepted better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Noreen

customer_reviews.title: Great table!
customer_reviews.text: The first table came very damaged on one side. Something heavy must have been placed on top or it was dropped. The table was packaged very poorly, too. I was told to keep the damaged table and they sent me another. This one was still poorly packaged but was not damaged. It is a sturdy table and was just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: GAM

customer_reviews.title: Almost ... A "homerun"!
customer_reviews.text: I have to laugh ... I read a number of reviews, prior to ordering, indicating damage to product on arrival. Well, I ordered anyway. Very nice table, exactly as described. But, sure enough, damaged on arrival. Edge dented. Can't blame the manufacturer, as I said, nice table. Problem? No packing material along edges of box, and, clearly, no care taken in shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Lois Stripling

customer_reviews.title: Best choice!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect emergency "add-on" table. It is small enough to fit in my kitchen next to my round oak table, and is extremely sturdy. Easily seats four people, and yet fits nicely behind my garage door when not needed.
customer_reviews.author: ABQ

customer_reviews.title: bent
customer_reviews.text: Table seems sturdy. It is bent , the table leans and is off level by at least 3 inches. No idea who to fix this
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great lightweight table
customer_reviews.text: Great lightweight table that folds up quickly and stores easily. I'm very happy with the table and I think it will last quite awhile.
customer_reviews.author: magicker71

customer_reviews.title: Versatile
customer_reviews.text: This table is sturdier than you'd expect and yet folds quickly and easily. It doesn't have the same locking mechanism most folding tables have which is nice in the sense that you can fold it up much faster.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: great table
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Christmas tree and sadly found that it was too high for my needs a reluctantly sent it back though it was so well made and sturdy I wished I could have found a reason to keep it. Would be great on a balcony as just an extra table. Much more stable and no wobble like card tables and the like. yet you have the convenience of folding and storing it away
customer_reviews.author: C. OCONNOR

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and with a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to fold and with a right size. It is useful to use for three people at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro

customer_reviews.title: Replacement is even worse than original defective one
customer_reviews.text: Original One: 2 inches crack on the side face of the table Replacement: ALL SCREWS ARE LOOSE AND OFF. They are simple no longer able to fix the lag to the table. Summary: the 2nd one is ALREADY a replacement for a defective first one. SHOULD YOU VERIFY THAT YOUR ITEM IS AT LEAST WORKING BEFORE SENDING IT OUT?
customer_reviews.author: fduphysics

customer_reviews.title: Great table! Glad I got it when I did
customer_reviews.text: Great table! Glad I got it when I did, price seems to be going up past couple of weeks. It's light-weight and easy to store/set up. Durable, too!
customer_reviews.author: SpoonRiver

customer_reviews.title: Love this table...just what I needed for the space I needed it in....
customer_reviews.text: Solid top and stable. I had an odd space and this fit in perfectly...but easy to move if you have a party... or what it in another location. Could find nothing like it in the stores... and so glad it looks so good. I did base my buying decision on other reviews that gave this height and the bar height good ratings.
customer_reviews.author: ecowarrior

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Love the table. Brought it to use for an outdoor event and lived up to all expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love - needed for my porch. Now we sit on the porch for brunch most weekends.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Nice size for accessories or extra party space.
customer_reviews.text: Great compact table when extra space needed for parties, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice small table
customer_reviews.text: This is just the right size for my use. I do a lot of painting in the winter, and this table fits my space. It is sturdy and folds up easily for storage. I think it could fit two people eating at it, but not much more, so if you want it for dining table space, this probably wouldn't work.
customer_reviews.author: CLAUDIA SENOUR

customer_reviews.title: but this table is well made and sturdy. If you need a good size table that's ...
customer_reviews.text: After some of the other reviews of tables, I was not sure what to expect...but this table is well made and sturdy. If you need a good size table that's portable, this would be a good choice.
customer_reviews.author: John Jr

customer_reviews.title: Does the Job
customer_reviews.text: Does what I need it to do. Easy and convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Jaunts

customer_reviews.title: It's work and the price is great
customer_reviews.text: It's the right size for the corner I have it in and light enough to move but steady enough to put things on it
customer_reviews.author: Karen Greene

customer_reviews.title: Plastic folding table
customer_reviews.text: I can't open it! I gave it 3 stars because I have no idea what it's going to be like, since I can't open it. I can't move the legs at all. Is there some kind of thing, I need to do, to get the legs down? I'm really frustrated! Ok, the Fed-ex guy opened it for me, I'm just weak, but I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Tree Pedestal
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for raising my small Christmas tree off the floor to avoid a cat-nado type disaster.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Nice table
customer_reviews.text: This was a very nice table, only advise is allow for the height of table if your using a table cloth.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Herty

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sweetheart table!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this table for my son's wedding and it is the perfect sweetheart table!
customer_reviews.author: debbie s.

customer_reviews.title: It lasted a few months, it felt flimsy when ...
customer_reviews.text: It lasted a few months, it felt flimsy when it arrived and after a while one of the welded on metal tabs by the legs fell off. After that it kept wobbling. Threw the whole thing out and brought a proper table.
customer_reviews.author: Everything Stops at Half Past 3 for Tea

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was a great product for the price. Very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan E. Erickson

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my folding table
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my folding table. It fits all purposes intended. Easy to manipulate, to open and to close. Wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Coco

customer_reviews.title: Item is listed as a 3 ft. Round folding table. However it is a 32 " round folding table.
customer_reviews.text: Misinformation in product description. You can tell this in the part number if you're looking at part numbers.
customer_reviews.author: jeff c.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice sturdy little table. Perfect for a cake or desserts.
customer_reviews.author: Paul J Ruscito

customer_reviews.title: Strong table
customer_reviews.text: It is a sturdy table and the carrying handle makes it easy to transport. To make it better, it should have a way to lock it when it is set up. As it is, you have to be careful when moving it while it is set up.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: I really like this table--it's sturdy, compact, and easy to open and close. I use it in my special ed classroom for group activities.
customer_reviews.author: A.G. Whitlock

customer_reviews.title: Table was perfect for POW table.
customer_reviews.text: The table was just what I needed to set up a POW table for a ceremony. The packing was not very good. The box was tore when I received the table and one of the tips for the bottom of the table leg was missing. I do hope the packing improves.
customer_reviews.author: SAL

customer_reviews.title: Must but
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful for a sweetheart table. Already used for 2 events
customer_reviews.author: Tracy2m14

customer_reviews.title: Love this Table
customer_reviews.text: Love the height and the ease of setup. no assembly required, and I use this to place my dress makers dummy in their wedding gowns on it to hem and bustle. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does what I got it for
customer_reviews.text: Does what I bought it for! Wish a chair or two came with it. The chairs I have are okay but don't match with the table.
customer_reviews.author: Whaddafuxup

customer_reviews.title: Great table
customer_reviews.text: Well made, solid table. Perfect size for two persons to sit comfortable. Can also be used as a portable desk. Folds down for easy storage.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: An excellent and easy way to have a cabaret!
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, yet sturdy. Easy to set up and take down. Very stable when in use. Great for games, parties, cabarets. I love these tables.
customer_reviews.author: CarefulConsumer

customer_reviews.title: Patio Tables
customer_reviews.text: These tables are great when purchased with Adams Barstools. They are the right height for barstools during "Happy Hour". Very Pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Coovie4653

customer_reviews.title: great little cost-effective & quality folding patio table. A delight in every respect.
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty, light-weight but well built patio table with rust/sun resistant properties that is easily folded for storage at a very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: C. Tep

customer_reviews.title: Great for drinking game!
customer_reviews.text: Good for the chandelier game for 4 players. Good for two people to use it for dining. A ding on the table and box, but fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This table is perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: This table is perfect for my needs. It's very portable, easy to carry, folds flat against the wall, and it's sturdy. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Lazo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice little table at a good price. Setup is a snap and sturdy to eat off of.
customer_reviews.author: humprat

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy table.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. Not much to say about the style, it is as described and seems to be sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Tess

customer_reviews.title: Fit needs perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, space saving, great delivery service. Top is a heavy form of "masonite heavy duty formed plastic" seen on many banquet tables, but it is not "granite". "Granite white" describes the color. My spouse and I thought it a great addition to our entertainment needs.
customer_reviews.author: phishmonger

customer_reviews.title: Tables were sturdy and easy to store
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. Tables were sturdy and easy to store.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this Bistro
customer_reviews.text: Great table! we ordered 6 of these and love them! The only reason for the 4* is that one of the tables has a slightly shorter leg and it wobbles so we can't use it. We discovered this after opening the box for an event 3 months later. Great bistro table
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: And they suck just as much now as they did when I ...
customer_reviews.text: When we needed an extra card table we got one. And they suck just as much now as they did when I was a kid. After just moments of exposure to direct sunlight the top began to bubble. We took that back and I found this online. I made my purchase decision based off of reviews and feedback. I have not been disappointed. It is lightweight and easy to move and set up. I would highly recommend it as an extra table for guests or to put food out on. Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: AJS0121

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great table!! Clean up real easy and fold up quick for easy storage!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love its diversity
customer_reviews.text: We moved to a retirement facility recently, and the kitchen is OK but tight. I set this up when I'm making pie crust or difficult items, and it's perfect. I use it as a serving table when we have guests, and like it this way as well.
customer_reviews.author: janed

customer_reviews.title: it's just I need
customer_reviews.text: The size is perfect for me to put on clutter. It is very likely new。 While it was not quiet easy for me to unfold it, it was too tight.
customer_reviews.author: YANG WANG

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Table
customer_reviews.text: Love my table, perfect fit for the spot I had picked out. Purchased table to sit between two vintage chairs I purchased. Covered table with cloth and decorative items. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It work like a champ with bed lifts to make it a conversation table
customer_reviews.author: Bridget

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied Customer
customer_reviews.text: Loved this table, was perfect for what I needed to use it for. It will get used many many more times. Thank you ! Satisfied Customer Dianne
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Layfield

customer_reviews.title: good little table
customer_reviews.text: this is a good, sturdy little table. Ordered for use at classroom activity center. Nice washable surface, collapsible, shipped quickly
customer_reviews.author: officeworker2007

customer_reviews.title: very good
customer_reviews.text: it's very convenient to fold and easy to use. doesn't require much space. It's best for small rooms. sturdy as well
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good and sturdy. Legs fold flat while unseen when covered with tablecloth
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Baughman

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase I've made.
customer_reviews.text: This table is great quality and very steady. I own the costco large 6ft table and love it so much. This is exactly like those. I think it's one of the best purchases I've made.
customer_reviews.author: Carrotsbeme

customer_reviews.title: perfect size
customer_reviews.text: The perfect size for a small area where you want a table! I use it for my sunroom, perfect for my husband and I of a morning.
customer_reviews.author: Jane N. Crain

product_meta.title: Flash Furniture 2.63-Foot Round Granite White Plastic Folding Table
product_meta.description: This petite folding table is the perfect accompaniment to your camper lifestyle. Pull out this portable table while riding in the RV or camper or wait until you get to your designation to enjoy your dinner outside. The 2.67' round table surface accommodates up to 3 adults. Have this mini table around for card games or as your designated snack and drink table when you have guests over. The legs fold flat to transport and store away. This event table can be used outdoors during good weather must be stored indoors. This table offers a solution to accommodate small items without taking up a lot of floor space.
feature_bullets: This portable folding table can go anywhere - camping trips, road trips and with traveling sales teams. Use around the home as your personal table or to seat 3 guests for a quick card game.
Commercial grade folding table, water and stain resistant, easy to clean
1.75" thick granite white top, 220 lb. static load capacity
Non-locking gray powder coated legs, floor protective caps
PRODUCT MEASUREMENTS >>> Overall Size: 31.5"W x 31.5"D x 30.25"H

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars152 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
